Author: sieemma
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: I looked through your whitepaper closely and it was fantastic but one thing I did not like and makes me run away from some projects is the story of buyback. The word BUYBACK has been used many times in the ICO world to deceive people into buying. This buyback may or may never happen so I advise those who just saw that and rushing to buy. Invest at your own risk.

Author: WindEnergyMining
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: By the time the reminder is published, we have nearly completed WEM buyback. Only a small amount of tokens, the owners of which had forgotten about them for some reason, remained. The announcement is addressed to these people. That is why we can safely say this is not the case you are talking about. All unsold WEM tokens have been burnt. Our second token, WEMcoin, is a utility token we issued as a part of broadening the scope of activities after an ICO. The new token is a means of payment, which is used to pay for the services our company provides. You can find more information on our website.

Author: WindEnergyMining
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: We have equipped and launched the first mining container of our own assembly. The container is designed to operate on wind energy, which is its unique feature.  The specificity of operation of wind turbines is that in the absence of the wind or if its speed decreases, energy generation either stops or its volume declines. In case a wind power station suspends generation due to weather conditions, all connected electricity consumers switch to power supply from a public grid. Production costs rise, and mining profitability is reduced as a result. In addition, the electricity on the public grid originates from different sources, and fossil energy makes up its significant share.  Since our policy is to utilize renewable energy for mining, we have developed a special container where the operation of miners is adjusted depending on current wind conditions.  This container is controlled through a controller that automatically turns off and connects miner groups with the power consumption of 12 kW as the energy generation increases or decreases. Thus, minimizing electricity consumption from the public network, we do our utmost to ensure that mining is carried out with the use of electricity produced by our wind stations.  On the market, we will be offering 20 and 40-foot cryptocurrency mining containers allowing to host Antminer S9, S11, S15, S17, and other ASIC models, and designed to use energy from wind generators with a capacity of 200 kW – 1MW. On the territory of our wind park, in turn, we plan to install such containers next to each wind turbine.

Author: WindEnergyMining
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: [ANN] [WEMcoin] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining.   It is hard to imagine what we would do without electricity - it supports almost all processes necessary for normal life. However, the electricity production has its negative effects.  The use of fossil energy resources results in rising levels of CO2 in the atmosphere that becomes the cause of the greenhouse effect, and subsequently, climate change. Electrical power consumption is steadily growing, new kinds of consumption appear, and cryptocurrency mining has more recently become one of such kind. Mining consumes an enormous amount of electricity that can be compared with the consumption of individual countries. This particular issue has become one of the reasons for restrictions imposed on the cryptocurrency mining.  There is no doubt that we need to re-evaluate our attitude towards the production and use of electricity. The transition to renewable energy sources is the only possible solution.  At the same time, the electricity producers face reluctance of bureaucratic entities and political elites, closely related to oil and gas monopolies, to support green production. The possibilities of producers are limited by the energy regulating bodies, new unreasonable requirements are introduced, and the production becomes impossible in principle.  Our company, ETB Ltd., has been dealing with wind electric energy production in Latvia for more than 10 years The company owns 7 wind-driven electric power stations with total capacity of 4.5 MW. The geographical location of our wind power stations lets produce electricity throughout the year.  As a solution of the issues, we consider creating a model in which renewable electricity is used for cryptocurrency mining, and the proceeds from the cryptocurrency sale are invested in the development of green electricity production. This model will let explore the possibility of effective green power production without state aid. The transition to such a funding model would improve the possibilities of producers and become an incentive for the creation of a new, blockchain-based, electricity trade system.  The combination of mining and electricity production has an additional advantage. Electrical energy demand within 24 hours is uneven: there are peak demand hours, and there are hours when the demand is low, but production remains the same. Electricity accumulation might resolve the problem. However, by now, it is technically impossible to accumulate a great amount of electrical power in order to provide it to the grid later, because there are no sufficiently large, inexpensive, high-performance accumulators that would perform the task and would not affect the electricity price. The alternative is either to reduce production or to create artificial energy consuming facilities. Consuming electrical power at the time when it is not used, mining rigs can effectively serve as such facilities. The imbalance between the demand for and supply is thus regulated through mining, which eventually has a beneficial effect on the electrical grid.  Within the project, we plan to increase the capacity of our renewable resource park and install containers with GPU and ASIC units next to each wind power station. The obtained cryptocurrency (BTC, LTC, ETH, Zcash, Dash etc.) will subsequently be sold at an exchange, and provide funding for the further development of the project.  We also offer those wishing to an opportunity to install their own mining rigs on the territory of our wind park, and to use green electricity directly from its producer.   WEMcoin is an ERC20 token on the Ethereum blockchain  Smart contract address: 0x093af159e4b504fb0962e49260182768b8e54a4e  WEMcoin is the functional token of the project and is intended to serve as: a means of payment for renting a place for mining equipment; a means of payment for electricity; a medium of exchange when selling mined cryptocurrency  After its release, WEMcoin will be on sale on cryptocurrency exchanges  To date, you can buy or sell WEMcoin on Forkdelta Guidance on the purchase of WEMcoin on Forkdelta is available on the official website of the project www.etb.lv   WEMcoin price will depend on the exchange rates. WEMcoin rate will be sustained through the funds from the economic activities of the company - electricity production, and mining.  Partners: www.belovitlab.ru www.smartcontract.ru   Connect us: Facebook Telegram Twitter  Official website www.etb.lv

Author: WindEnergyMining
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: At this stage, we do not plan to build wind farms in other countries, but we are considering the possibility to continue the project in the countries neighbouring Latvia in perspective.

Author: WindEnergyMining
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: As we mentioned in the previous comment, we do not plan to build wind farms in other countries at this stage. In the case if we take such a decision, we’ll build wind farms in the neighbouring countries with the same climate conditions. It might be the Baltic coast of Lithuania or Estonia. The value of our project is that the territory, where the power stations are located, is the property of our company, and there's no need in additional costs for land purchase or lease. What about technologies, then yes, we plan to modernize the wind park  in line with the latest technological trends.

Author: Greenwinter
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: Do you want to build a wind farm to feed specifically a mining farm? And why exactly? Why not public electricity for any consumers?

Author: WindEnergyMining
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: We don't want to build a wind park, we have already got it. We want to make better use of the wind energy that we produce, that is, to use it for cryptocurrency mining. The income generated from mining is planned to be forwarded to increasing of productive capacities and development of green electric energy production. As we have already said in Whitepaper, green energy development is hindered by oil and gas companies, which are often associated with political and bureaucratic structures, lobbying. Marketing of the produced electricity through cryptocurrency mining makes electricity production from renewable energy sources more independent form state policy on one hand, and makes the mining process environmentally friendly, on the other hand.

Author: WindEnergyMining
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: As we have already written in our Whitepaper, we plan to supplement the capacity of our wind park by solar generators. At the first stage, we plan to install solar panels with the capacity of 2 MW. We have also developed a technical project for the building of greenhouses with solar panels:

Author: WindEnergyMining
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: We have got  prototype units, the performance is good. If the price of one kilowatt of produced and sold to an  electric grid electricity is around 0.09 EUR per kWh, the price of electricity that is used for mining is equal to 0.62 EUR per kWh.                                                                      That's why we plan to raise funds, to increase scales of  production.

Author: shrugs
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: I'm ethically required to tell all of you to stay very far away from anything related to this project. The primary developer on this project is struggling to develop the token and crowdsale contracts to support the ICO, which is honestly just ridiculous.  (for those unaware, developing a token contract and crowdsale contract are the easiest possible thing to do in Ethereum right now (it's literally copy-paste), and the fact that they're struggling is _not_ a good sign for this project to really any project they're associated with).

Author: WindEnergyMining
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: Before posting anything, we highly recommend the author of the post to read if not a Whitepaper, then at least the announcement, where the essence of the token and the project is explained. Statements of this kind of an “expert” about “struggling to develop the token”, sound at least strange. If the author is not acquainted with the Ethereum platform principles, we wish to make clear that this platform lets easily create a token for those projects which do not involve the creation and use of an own platform and a source code, which our project is.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining

Author: WindEnergyMining
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining. Token sale start on March 20, 2018  PROJECT UPDATE PAGE 6  How often do we think what we and our children breath in? Do we think what electricity is made of when we turn on the kettle in the morning, or why it snows where it shouldn’t be any snow? Crypto currency mining consumes a huge amount of electricity, at production of which mainly fossil sources – gas, coal -  are used. This particular issue has become one of the reasons for restrictions imposed on the mining of crypto-currency. The only way to solve this problem is to develop and increase the production of alternative energy  Unfortunately, the green electricity producers often face reluctance of bureaucratic entities and political elites, closely related to oil and gas monopolies, to support such production. Moreover, producers face deliberate intention to impede their development. The possibilities of the producers are limited by the bodies regulating energy sector, new unreasonable requirements are introduced, and the production becomes impossible in principle. In such circumstances, the payback problem is thrown into sharp relief. The possibility to build new green power stations is doubtful, because the political and bureaucratic obstacles connected with oil and gas sector lobbying, limit the freedom of actions of the industry willing to develop green energy production.  The Wind Energy Mining project aims to circumvent these obstacles.  Our company has been dealing with wind electric energy production in Latvia for more than 10 years The company owns 7 wind-driven electric power stations with total capacity of 4.5 MW. The geographical location of our wind power stations lets produce electricity throughout the year. We are going to use our electric energy for mining for cryptocurrencies and to allocate the proceeds from mining to the development of production and new power stations construction.   ICO OBJECTIVE AND DETAILS ICO objective is fundraising for the further development of wind energy production, through an Ethereum based token issue. WEM tokens are debt tokens WEM price – 0.001 ETH Accepted currency – Ethereum Buyback price – 0.0015 ETH   Whitepaper https://etb.lv/pdf/Whitepaper_Wind_Energy_Mining_(en).pdf  ICO launch: March 20, 2018  Buyback start: in 9 months after the ICO and fund raising Buyback period: 2 years Detailed information on our token, possibilities of buying, and buyback you can find on our homepage www.etb.lv  PROJECT DESCRIPTION Purchase of mining equipment Increasing the capacity of the wind park and its supplement by solar power stations Use of renewable electric energy for cryptocurrency mining Cryptocurrency selling – return of investments and further development of the project  ALLOCATION OF TOKENS 90% - ICO participants  5% - the team  5% - bonus program  ALLOCATION OF ICO FUNDS 28% - purchase of 1,000 ASIC Innosilicon A6 LTC or 2,000 Antminer L3+ and 1,000 Antminer S9 12% - purchase of GPU equipment (6,000 GPU Radeon VEGA 64) 15% - construction of solar power stations with total installed capacity of 2 MW 15% - project implementation costs (construction, electric installation) 30% - modernization and increasing the capacity of the wind park  RELIABILITY OF INVESTMENTS * Existing wind park – guaranteed electric energy for mining * Long-term operational experience * Transparency of the project – all information is available on our website If the planned amount is not raised (or bigger amount is raised), the project costs will be reduced or increased proportionally according to the amount of raised funds. The project will be started within the available amount.  PROJECT ROADMAP 1Q 2018 – Preparation for the ICO, the ICO launch, fund raising Up to the end of 2018 - Procurement and installation of mining equipment, and wind generator park supplement by solar power stations 2019 - Mining. Token buyback 2020 - Mining. Token buyback. Renewable resource park modernization and capacity increasing  Partners: www.belovitlab.ru www.smartcontract.ru   Connect us: We are on   Facebook Telegram Twitter   links on www.etb.lv

Author: Javi_Anibarro
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: if i remember it correctly,this kind of project had been created a few months ago before 2018. but until now we could not see anything from them or even they did not active anymore. can you tell me what is your relation with them ? because both of you use 'WIND' or based on 'WIND' to make the project. lastly, what make you so special other than 'Green' thing ? what is the differences between your project and other project? as we can see none of them can survive for a year or event they were only survived for a few months time.

Author: WindEnergyMining
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Wind Energy Mining. Green Energy – Green Mining
Body: We do not have any relation to any other project. In the process of the development, we've done some research and have come to the conclusion that there are some projects that use the word "wind". Our main difference from other projects is that we've got our own production base presented by the wind park, and our own wind electricity ensures the viability of the project. Mining will let us sell the electricity at a higher price than when it is sold to a grid. When selling electricity to the grid, the price is 0.09 EUR per kWh, mining will let sell it at 0.62 EUR per kWh. Thus received funds, in turn, will go towards the development of the renewable energy park, which is our main goal.
